args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that |cos z| ≥ |cos (Re z)|.
-/

theorem complex_abs_cos_ge_real (z : Complex) :
  Complex.abs (Complex.cos z) ≥ Complex.abs (Complex.cos z.re) := by sorry
